name: grond
description:
Are you strong enough to walk the path to the other human?
There's 1 path between Red and Blue and if you don't hurry, strong AI armies will get in your way.
Named after a certain fight in one WoG map (Gauntlet of the Grond in Swords of Night and Day by Jim Vogan), which was probably named after Morgoth's hammer from Tolkien's Silmarillion.
Size L,
2 humans,
6 AIs,
Average Road,
average timer and sim turns,
160%,
standard trades for town and color,
leave AIs' towns as random,
1x111 res,
tech res if passage to one of the AIs generates as a guarded portal on the road, you can't beat that guard without big losses and can't go around it
Suggested mods: HotA to get non-grass native terrain for Conflux and at least one mod with a new town.
author: Warzyw647

1.02: added repulsive connections to make the road between the players more straight
'added repulsive connections to AIs to make them start on both sides of the road
1.03: limited version for in branch 1.3 to vcmi 1.3.x and added branch 1.4 for vcmi versions 1.4+
1.04: added human player limit instead of ai player limit for compatibility with 1.4

chinese.name: 8人随机大地图模板（Grond）
chinese.description:
随机地图模板，大小为L，包含2名人类玩家和6名AI玩家，有标准的道路。人类玩家需要尽快通过唯一道路到达对方，以免被强大的AI军队阻挡。
建议160%难度开局，
每个玩家拥有1x111资源，
如果通往某个AI玩家的道路生成了一个被守护的传送门，那么你必须打败守卫或通过其他方式绕过它。
建议启用深渊号角模组，以获得非草原的原生地形，以及至少一个包含新城镇的模组。
模板名字意为“战锤”，来源于一个WOG地图（Gauntlet of the Grond in Swords of Night and Day，作者Jim Vogan），而该地图名称可能又来源于托尔金《精灵宝钻》中魔苟斯的战锤。
